alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 1:15PM MST until January 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Central and East Laramie County Wyoming and Kimball County Nebraska. This includes Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs and Kimball. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
